page.title: 14Boston United go to Wembley
page.content: Boston beat Altrincham 3-2 in the semi - final of the FA trophy At half time Boston were winning 2-0 .Altrincham drew level to 2-2 and Bob Lee scored Bostons last goal in the last minutes. colours are a amber and pinned striped top, black shorts.At wembley they lost to Wealdstone 2-1.Cook scored the goal for Boston and he scored another but it was disallowed because he was off-side.It was the first time that Boston ever got to Wembley.When they come home they were cheered on if they had won it.Their away kit is white top with pin striped red going vertically. Their shorts are red and their stockings are white.
